thread.title: For the U.S., kicking out Russian spies may not be enough

title: For the U.S., kicking out Russian spies may not be enough
text:
For the U.S., kicking out Russian spies may not be enough Wednesday, March 28, 2018 - 01:58 
As the U.S. conducts its biggest post-Cold War expulsion of Russian diplomats, who they brand intelligence officials, they are dealing with a different cadre of Russian spies than in the past. Reuters' Jonathan Landay explains why. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
As the U.S. conducts its biggest post-Cold War expulsion of Russian diplomats, who they brand intelligence officials, they are dealing with a different cadre of Russian spies than in the past.
